items.title: Blamed for the nation’s historic measles outbreak, West Texas Mennonites have hardened their views on vaccines
bullets: • Anita Froese's middle child came down with fatigue, body aches and the tell-tale sign of measles
• After a week, the disease finally reached her youngest, who vomited all night as her fever spiked to 104
• Froese never brought her children to a doctor, administered cod liver oil, vitamins, tea and broth
• None of her kids are fully vaccinated against measles

items.title: Microsoft Will Finally Kill an Encryption Cipher That Enabled a Decade of Windows Hacks
bullets: • Microsoft is killing off an obsolete and vulnerable encryption cipher that Windows has supported by default for 26 years
• RC4, short for Rivist Cipher 4, is a nod to mathematician and cryptographer Ron Rivest of RSA Security, who developed the stream cipher in 1987
• The RC4 fallback has been a favorite weakness hackers have exploited to compromise enterprise networks

• The result was a series of workshops between Dutch and U.S

bullets: • Zootopia 2 is the clear favorite to come top at the box office this weekend
• Five Nights at Freddy’s 2 likely to take a steep fall from its $64-million opening last weekend
• Wicked: For Good should land third, with Ella McCay (the only new release playing in over 2,000 theaters) and How the Grinch Stole Christmas looking likely to battle for fourth and fifth places

items.title: Theater counts: Zootopia 2 fends off a surge of new titles to retain its spot as the widest release.
bullets: • Zootopia 2 scored $158.8 million in its first five days at the domestic box office and snatching the number one spot from Wicked: For Good
• This weekend the two top contenders will face off with a bevy of newcomers, including another sequel, looking to unseat the current champs
• The widest of those newcomers is Five Nights at Freddy’s 2, which starts out in 3,412 theaters

items.title: The Numbers Business Report: our official forecast for 2026
bullets: • The Numbers Business Report: our official forecast for 2026 box office
• Box office receipts are projected to reach $9.8 billion, a 10% increase on the anticipated 2025 total of $8.87 billion
• The Super Mario Galaxy, due on April 3, tops the slate with forecast receipts of $550 million
• Mid‑tier wide releases are forecast to generate $4.57 billion, up 10% year on year

• Walt Disney will release the sequel in 4,000 theaters throughout North America

items.title: Weekend projections: Wicked: For Good soars to $150-million domestic debut
bullets: • Wicked: For Good will storm to $150 million this weekend, according to Universal’s Sunday-morning projection
• That should give it the second-best weekend of 2025, behind A Minecraft Movie's $162.8 million
• The studio is projecting $76 million overseas for a $226 million global debut
